Package photosFx.controller

package photosFx.controller

  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    AdminController
    Admin view, which allows creation and deletion of users.
    AlbumsController
    Albums view, which allows creation, deletion, and renaming of albums.
    BaseController
    Base controller for the application, common method for slideshow, opening the photo, and editing captions and tags
    BaseController.EditPhotoController
    Open the selected photo in the photo editor
    BaseController.SlideshowController
    Controller for the slideshow view, only shows photo + name and allows for navigation
    MainController
    Admin view, which allows creation and deletion of users.
    PhotoGridController
    Controller for the photo grid view.
    SearchController
    Controller for the search view.
